verses.text: \w Man|strong="H0120"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, living \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w short|strong="H7116"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* many miseries.

\w Who|strong="H5975"\w* cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w flower|strong="H6731"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w is|strong="H5975"\w* destroyed, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* fleeth \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* continueth \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* same state.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* dost thou \w think|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* meet \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w open|strong="H6491"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* conceived \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* seed? \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w only|strong="H0259"\w* art?

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* man \w are|strong="H3117"\w* short, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee: thou hast \w appointed|strong="H2706"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* bounds which \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w*.

Depart \w a|strong="H5921"\w* little \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* \w rest|strong="H2308"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wished \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* come, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hireling.

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* hath \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w*, \w it|strong="H0518"\w* groweth green \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* boughs thereof \w sprout|strong="H2498"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w its|strong="H0518"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w its|strong="H0518"\w* \w stock|strong="H1503"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*:

\w At|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* scent \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w spring|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* bring forth leaves, \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* first planted.

\w But|strong="H4191"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* when \w he|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* stripped \w and|strong="H0120"\w* consumed, I pray you \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H0346"\w* \w he|strong="H0120"\w*?

\w As|strong="H4325"\w* if \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* should depart \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* emptied \w river|strong="H5104"\w* should \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*:

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* fallen \w asleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H6965"\w*; \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* broken, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H6965"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w*, \w that|strong="H4310"\w* thou mayst protect \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H7585"\w* hell, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w pass|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w*. \w time|strong="H5704"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* thou wilt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w Shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, thinkest thou, \w live|strong="H2421"\w* again? \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* am \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w warfare|strong="H6635"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* expect \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w change|strong="H2487"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

Thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee: \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* thou shalt reach \w out|strong="H3027"\w* thy right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Thou \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* hast \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w steps|strong="H6806"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w spare|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

Thou hast \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* offences as \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w bag|strong="H6872"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* hast cured \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5307"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* cometh \w to|strong="H4725"\w* nought, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H5307"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H4725"\w* removed \w out|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* its \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w Waters|strong="H4325"\w* wear \w away|strong="H7857"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* inundation \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H0776"\w* little \w and|strong="H0776"\w* little \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w washed|strong="H7857"\w* \w away|strong="H7857"\w*: so \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* manner thou shalt \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w*.

Thou hast strengthened \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* little while, \w that|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* may pass \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*: thou shalt change \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* shalt \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

Whether \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* come \w to|strong="H1121"\w* honour \w or|strong="H3808"\w* dishonour, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* live, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w pain|strong="H3510"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.
